abstract: Lee Jung-Soo (Korean: 이정수; born 8 January 1980) is a South Korean footballer who plays as a central defender. He is currently playing for Al-Sadd in Qatar and a member of the South Korea national football team.He was a member of South Korea U-19 national football team.
